title: SBA Oddity
body:
Moxie Blog to SBA
Moxie Blog to SBA
Read our business plan and put your helmet on

Moxie Blog to SBA
Approve our loan and we'll be gone
Check financials and may Dan's blog be with you

This is Moxie Blog to SBA
You've really caused me stress
And the readers want to know if the loan's okay
Now it's time to write Dan an e-mail today

"This is SBA to Moxie Blog
I'm looking through the loan
And I'm reading in a most peculiar way
And your graphs look very excellent today"

"For here am I sitting in my small cube
Far above the floor
Lunch time is at noon
And I smell like a baboon"

"Though I've read one hundred thousand words
I'm feeling very good
And I think my red pen knows which box to mark
Tell your wife hello and Bogart not to bark"

Moxie Blog to SBA
Your e-mail's down, there's something wrong
Will you write me, SBA?
Will you write me, SBA?
Will you write me, SBA?
Will you....

"Here am I sitting in my small cube
Far above the floor
Lunch time is at noon
And I smell like a baboon"
author: Dan

comments.author: Oz
comments.body: Dan, you're so cute.  I'm glad to see a post, though.  I came here with every intention of contributing a threatening comment to your previous post, demanding something, anything!  Even an update on your beard!

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: My beard is doing good. Thanks for asking!

comments.author: Lor
comments.body:
You should record the song as an MP3, then we can all download it and send it to the SBA. Yeah, it'd probably annoy the SBA to the point they reject the loan, but you could become some sort of musical superstar and become as big a star as Slash.

Imagine it, some random person with a blog posting up Halloween pictures excitedly, of them dressed up as "Dan"...

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: That would be pretty sweet, wouldn't it.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Nicole, what on earth are you talking about?

comments.author: Einahpets
comments.body: Sweet. Diabetic. Just like candy. Whoooo.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: I guess only Stephanie gets me.
